description: This restaurant situated in the centre of Sirmione just a stone’s throw from the lake is striking for its elegant outdoor terrace. This refined setting provides the backdrop for creative meat and fish dishes full of individual character. A fine display of wines adorns the shelves in the lounge-cum-wine bar on the first floor.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
